snippet.title: Rune Fencer Illyia Gameplay Trailer 2021
snippet.description:
Are you lost, child? Explore and fight through the bleak and beautiful ruins of a fallen magical kingdom. Find your missing sister, and your way home, before it's too late.

Rune Fencer Illyia is an enormous indie metroidvania coming to Steam, Epic Games Store and Nintendo Switch. Please support us and wishlist us!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1104600/Rune_Fencer_Illyia/
Epic: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/rune-fencer-illyia


The game is being developed by just a couple of people at Nootbox Games. Follow us on Twitter! https://twitter.com/NootboxGames

Join us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/nootboxgames

Rune Fencer Illyia's sound and score are created by Daniel Swearengin. To hear more of his work please visit: https://www.swearmusic.com/
